synopsis.text:
Grandpa Shappo, a wise old hat; Enma, a fiery demon prince; the elegant half-demon, half-human Princess Yukiko; and Kapaeru, a frog-demon with a penchant for espionage, form an unlikely team in the bustling city of Tokyo during the 1970s. Their mission, as the Youkai Patrol, is to protect humanity from the malevolent youkai that seek to wreak havoc on Earth.

This motley crew faces off against a diverse array of adversaries, ranging from a vindictive squid and a sleepwalking feline to a sentient pot of snakes and even a literal walking butt! As they navigate through a surreal world filled with slapstick humor, risqu√© behavior, and a plethora of obscure cultural references, the Youkai Patrol must work together to maintain the delicate balance between the human realm and the supernatural.

With stakes as high as the absurdity of their foes, this unconventional team of heroes might just be the world's last hope. Prepare for a wild ride filled with laughter, lewdness, and unforgettable adventures in this unique take on the supernatural anime genre.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
